analysis.description:
DragonTreasureToken.sellPrice (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#145) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- sell (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#217-220)

DragonTreasureToken.buyPrice (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#145-147) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- buy (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#212-216)

TokenERC20 (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#63-124) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#81-84)

Reentrancy in DragonTreasureToken.buyBlueStarEgg (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#220-226):
	External calls:
	- deductedTokens = payment.buyBlueStarEgg(msg.sender,_tokens,_amount) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#224-226)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol)

DragonTreasureToken.buyPrice should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0x2118840b16aaf95a0f0027b7ac32f5986925d935.sol#145-147)
